text: Mani Raman (1 January 1971 - 6 March 2016), commonly referred to by his stage name Kalabhavan Mani, was an Indian movie actor and singer. Mani started his career as a mimicry artist with the Kalabhavan troupe. Mani was in over 200 movies. He was known for his character and villain roles. He won the National Film Award and Kerala State Film Award in 1999 for his role as Ramu in Vasanthiyum Lakshmiyum Pinne Njaanum.കലാഭവന്‍ മണിക്ക് ഇത് എന്തുപറ്റി?. mangalam.com (9 October 2013). Retrieved on 2015-09-20.A Online Malayalam Cinema News Portal . Cinidiary. Retrieved on 20 September 2015.He also acted in many Tamil films starring villain role. Mani died in Kochi, Kerala on 6 March 2016. He had liver disease. Mani was aged 45. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Indian movie actors Category:Tamil actors
title: Kalabhavan Mani
